doctext: a small home - made bomb exploded at dawn today at the headquarters of the shoe industry workers union , in this city , causing small material damages . the bomb , made with black gunpowder , was planted at 03 ##30 on the windows ##ill of the building located on 215 ##7 tu ##cum ##an street in barrio alta , cordoba , where the bomb interrupted union functions . this union is headed by miguel monte ##ro . the explosion caused some panic near the area , but it was soon discovered that the blast only shattered windows . no casualties were reported . ( passage omitted )
